msbt.message: We're going to have such. Deep. Chats. I'm talking late nights! Over coffee! On walks! Ohmigosh! All! The! Time!
My friend-making strat is to go HARD with the personal chat. I always want to learn everything in one go!OHMIGOSH! Spill it all!
Sooooo! What am I going to learn about you today? Let'ssee

'K! Because I told you were into .But later on I was like, "Ohmigosh! IS that still 's capital-T Thing? I need to ask!"I'm so happy to know I was right, I feel like I'm a fizzy bath bomb. Ka-sploosh! Fizzzzzz!
You know the other day when you said you really enjoy like ?That fact would totally still hold up in court, right?
I heart talking about you, so I told you were into .But later on I was all, "Ohmigosh! IS still into that? I better ask!"So I did! I have to keep my facts straight, !
Remember when I asked you about and you said I'd L-O-V-E ? Still think so?
I told you were totes all about .But later on I was like, "Haaang on! IS that still 's scene? Ohmigosh! I should ask!"So I did! And it is, and I still know what my best friend—that's you— likes, !
So, Still think I should give a whirl, ?
Because I like talking about you, I told you were into !But later on I was all, "Le uh-oh. IS that still 's scene? I should ask!"So I did! And, ohmigosh, it is, !
Hey! Remember the other day when you told me what you want to do with your life and I said, "WOW"?I said "WOW" because it's a fab plan! So I wanted to checkyou still plan to be ?
I told you want to be .But later on I was all, "Oh. Wait. IS that still 's deal? I should ask if it's still a deal!"So I did! And boom! It is! Looks like I can win a trivia contest any day, !

Ohmigosh! Remember how we were talking about life and stuff and you dropped a bomb on me? You yelled"!" I asked why you were yelling that, and you said it's your life's dream.I'm wondering if you drank too much coffee and were just yelling stuff— like I do—or if you're serious
Wow! That's beaucoup incredible.I was dancing at and our dream jobs came up. We agreed yours was fab!
Oh yeah! Is your hobby still ?
I told you were into .But later on I was all, "Oh. Wait. IS that still 's hobby? I should ask!"So I did! And it is! And your hobby is now my favorite " Fact," !
Hi, ! Say, are you still into ?

and I had a chat about you becausecome on. You're the best thing on this islandAnyhoo, I said, "Guess what fab hobby has? !"But then, later I was all"Is that still 's hobby? I'll ask next time we're in yelling distance!"I'm so happy I know you that well! I'm going to tell everyone everything I know about you! It'll be le bonkers!

Remember talking about your skills? I keep saying you have totes natural fashion talent. Walk the runway!, you've got the strut, and your cheekbones are so très fab I could die!But you still like to insist it's , don't you?

Me and were doing the collab thing and you came up because, duh, you're fab.Anyhoo, I mentioned your super skills and we were both like, "That's low-key cray!"But later on I was all, "Back it up. IS still the deal? I really should ask!"So I did! And it is! And that's the whole story up to this very instant, !
The other day you said you're skilled in , didn't you, ?

Because, like, and I were talking about you and how cool you are and I said"Did you know 's skill is ?"And was all, "No it isn't!" And I was all, "Ohmigosh, yes it is too!"And then later I was thinking, "Wait, is it still? I should ask!" So I did! And I was right!It's so cool having a friend you know EVERYTHING about. It means I've always got chat material!
So I heard from someone else
Soyou L-O-V-E more than any other kinds of ? Yes?

Yes! ! If you want the full disclosure? Legit my fave kind of too! It's like our brains are on the same frequency, our signals are crossed, and we know each other's thoughts!♪ We're psychic friends! All up in each other's brains. Psychic friends, ! ♪
Guess just how much I know about ? Nothing!But that's why we're best friends, ! You know all about !
Hey, so, . You like ? That is you, right?
! Ohmigosh, that's legit my top pick too!We are SO synced up! It's like we share the section of our brains!
I don't know anything AT ALL about . But I SUPER want to learn!Ohmigosh! You should host a seminar! I'll be your opening act!
I hear that, out of all , you like best. Is that really true?
Le sweet! There's nothing quite like , is there?
I don't know from . But if you're into it, , I want in too!Ohmigosh, you have GOT to give me all the deets on the wonders of sometime!
One of your fave is , right?
Yes! There's nothing more chic than , eh?
? I want to hear everything you know!I'm going to climb inside your head and listen to ALL your thoughts!Is that weird to say? To do? Both?<10_4 /> It's not weird for best friends!

Is it true you want to be
someday, ?
! Ohmigosh, you KNOW my history there, right? No? Then we have GOT to talk!
I don't honestly know anything about being , but it sounds legit fun, !
Is it true that your dream is to be a glam one day, ?
It's so TOTES fab that you know what you want to do! We've got that in common, you know!We're just a couple of besties with stars in our eyes and success in our futures, !
Ohmigosh, I don't know a whole lot about , but I'm super interested! You have got to tell me all about it sometime, !
Is it true that you're into , ?
Ohmigosh, I don't know a whole lot about , but I'm super interested, ! You have got to tell me all about it sometime!
Is it true that you're into ?
! Nice! Ohmigosh, we are so in sync!
Ohmigosh, I don't know a whole lot about , but I'm super interested! , you need to tell me all about it sometime!
Is it true you're way skilled at , ?
?! Ohmigosh, totes in my wheelhouse! We need to have a LENGTHY chat sometime!
Ohmigosh, I don't know a whole lot about , but I'm super interested, ! You so have to tell me all about it sometime!
Is it true that you're mega fab at ?
?! Ohmigosh, totes in my wheelhouse! We so need a deep talk sometime!
Ohmigosh, I don't know a whole lot about , but I'm super interested!You need to tell me all about it sometime, !
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't listen to music! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't read many books! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't read comics! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't watch movies! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't watch TV! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you aren't into sports! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't have a favorite drink! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't have a favorite food! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't know what you want to be! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard once that you don't have a hobby! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
Ohmigosh! I heard you think you don't have any special skills! Is that still true, ?
That's not true now. That's incorrect.
'K! I just figured I'd ask you myself and find out if it was true. Thanks for telling me, !
Ohmigosh, seriously?! Did I have old info?!
That's not right. Wait a second...
Le no?! OK, tell me one more time, !
Ohmigosh, ! So my info was legit after all!I just wanted to ask you straight up if it was true, you know? Thanks for telling me, .
Ohmigosh! I absolutely LIVE for music, ! What kind of tunes do your ears love?
Ohmigosh, I tooootally understand! My tastes change all the time too. Like, what time is it now, you know?So what are you into?
Ohmigosh, ! Tell me what kind of music's been booming in your brain lately!
I feel you so much! Pop is so fun to bop to! That's why I want to write pop songs!I want to help the world BOP!
Ohmigosh, yes! I love hip-hop! I've GOT to try and write a hip-hop song someday, !
There are so many amazing cartoon themes! Choruses that make you go UGH and bridges that WOOG! ♪ UGH! WOOG! WOOG! UGH! ♪ So good! We need to do duets of our faves sometime, !
Ooh, ! I shouldn't be surprised you'd go for that!You need to play me some of your fave tunes sometime, !
That's OK too! No music is kind of its own music. Check it out♪ ♪Pretty fab, right? I think so.
What kind of stuff do you like to read, ?
Right there with you, ! My tastes change all. The. Time. Too! So, what're you reading these days?
What kind of words are you soaking up these days?

Yes! Comics are fab! They transport you to these crazy worlds full of action and adventure and weird stuff.I read one about a talking couch once. It didn't make any sense, but I adored that story so much.We totes need to talk fave comics sometime, !

A lot of folks like to tell you the magazine industry's old news. They'll tell you print is deadWell, then why do 32 pages of fashion-magazine madness show up in my mailbox quarterly?Clothes. Makeup. Hairstyles. And 29 pages of ads for clothes, makeup, and hairstyling products.Magazines have got it ALL, !
Travel guides are a great buy. It's so fun reading them while planning your trip or just laying around the house!I know all the best places to eat in dozens of cities I've never even been to!
Ooh, ! I should've expected a deep cut from you! Well, if you like it, it has to be good! I'll give it a shot too, .

Ohmigosh! For real?Did you know that some video games contain more than a million words?Playing that game would be like reading 10 books or one overwritten fantasy novel!I'm happy I learned a little more about you, . Let's talk again soon, !
I'm a huge comic fan, ! What kind of comics do you read?
I get it, ! My tastes change all the time too. What kind of comics do you like now?
So, what kind of comics are all the rage in Land?

YES! Romantic comedies! Ohmigosh, I didn't know anybody else read those comics but me!My favorite's about the shred-tastic Princess of Rocketboarding and her true love, the Princess of Explosions!They search the world for each other, but HILARIOUS stuff always keeps them from happiness!Like, one time, a wizard swapped their minds! So they were together but also further apart than ever!Eventually they fooled the wizard a bunch and got their own brains back. It was hilarious AND romantic!I have to hear about your favorites sometime, !

Gag comics are great! When I was little, I loved the ones with slapstick. Nowadays I'm into the surreal stuff.Yeah, a guy hit with a pie is funny. But a fishflying a planeyelling, "So much for haberdashery"?!It's so funny, I can't breathe!<10_4 /> I mean it! Ohmigosh! My sides!<10_4 /> HABERDASHERY, !

Ohmigosh, sports comics! Have you ever read the one about the laserball championships?!The hero is all, "I'm gonna go be the champion of laserball!" and her mom is all, "No! You'll melt your face!"But the hero goes and practices and gets in the super leagues and she plays laserball better than anybodyUntil one daythe laserball is flying right for her faceandandAND I DON'T HAVE THE NEXT ISSUE YET!For realsies, , the suspense is going to melt MY face, !
Ooh, ! I guess I shouldn't be surprised that you go for those deep cuts. I totes want to read every comic there is, so I'm going to check this out first chance I get, !
That's OK. Ohmigosh, most folks I know don't read comics. They just wear the T-shirts, .Still, I'm happy I got to learn more about you, !
What kind of movies do you like to watch, ? The world needs to know!
It's OK, . What I like changes all the time too. So what kind of movies do you like now?
Hit me with facts! What kind of movies are you loving lately, ?
Ohmigosh, I totes feel you! You can enjoy a story AND music with musicals! How fab is that?!Whoever came up with singing your feelings so nobody has to memorize dialog was a genius, .

The anime on TV is pretty high quality nowadays, but they really ramp it up in movies!Ohmigosh, going to the theater and having anime pumped into your eyes for two hours straightTHE BEST!Later, I go to the store and buy the soundtrack! And the action figures! And the T-shirts! And the manga! ! I need to hear all about your fave anime flicks sometime, !

Sci-fi! Ohmigosh! I'm working on a sci-fi rock opera about a super advanced robot named Stuart!I know you're like, "Why is the robot named Stuart?" And that's what EVERYONE asks him!So Stuart's all, "I picked this name because I'm a fab robot with a brain that can decide its own things!"I'll tell you the rest sometime. Once I start writing it, !
Ohmigosh, ! I shouldn't be surprised you'd go for those movie deep cuts. I've been curious about that genre for a while. Recommend me some movies sometime, !
I totes le comprende! Sometimes I don't have time for a movie—I've got a TV series to binge-watch!Still, I'm happy I got to learn more about you, !
Let's talk TV, ! Is there a show you totes binge-watch, ?
I'm the same way, ! I love it today? Old news tomorrow! So what are you watching now?
So what kind of show is your fave right now?

Right? I can't live without music shows! I always record them, then play them over and over.It's a great way to learn what others are doing and help me gauge what the public is into!Ooh! We should watch music shows together sometime. I sing along with everything, so be prepared for fun!

Variety shows are great. My fave are prank shows. No! Stunt shows! Or both, but also with explosions.You know what we should do? We should audition to be on one of these shows!You figure out the prank, and I'll set up the pyrotechnics, !

Have you ever been watching a live- action show and said to yourself, "This needs more robots"?Boom. Anime's got your back.Robots that are people. Robots that are dogs. Robots that are buildings, bicycles, beach balls, houseplants Is that stuff happening in boring live-action shows? Didn't think so.<10_4 /> Anime's got your back, .
Ooh, ! I should've known you'd go for a deep cut, ! You have to tell me your favorites. Maybe we can check out a few episodes together, !
I hear you. There's so much to do these days that's not watching TV!Sometimes I only watch my TV when I'm playing video games on it!It's so cool to have learned more about you, !
Do you like watching or playing sports, ? Which ones?!
So which sport do you like now?
So which sport are you wild about right now, ?
I've always been confident in my badminton skills, but I saw a pro match and was all, "WHOA" "Those shuttlecocks are ZIPPING!" I'm nowhere near pro level, but we should play sometime!
Soccer is so cool! I never played growing up, but I started watching games and it is super fun! We have GOT to get everyone on the island together and play a match sometime, !
Judo's so fab! I took some judo classes growing up. And I even won some white belt matches!Me and you should look into setting up a tournament here on the island. That'd be fun!
Ooh, ! I should've known you'd go for a deep cut, ! I'd love to watch a match sometime, .
I hear you. There's a lot of stuff that can get your attention other than sports nowadays.It's so cool to have learned more about you, !
What kind of drinks do you enjoy, ?
So what do you like to drink nowadays?
So what kind of drinks have you been enjoying lately, ?

Yeah! You're one of us fresh- squeezed folks! I'll tell you how to get the tastiest juice Firstsneak up on . Then get your arm around it, and put it in a fruitlockThen yell, "GIMME JUUUUUUICE!"<10_4 /> It's a lot of work, but juice just tastes better when you squeeze it yourself.

Water! Have you seen all the types of water for sale now? Fizzy, fruity, mineralI even saw a spicy one!I've been thinking about starting a water-flavoring business. It'd be a whole line of fashion-forward fluids.Maybe you, a true water aficionado, can be my lead taste tester!

Did you know folks have lots of different names for soda?Where I grew up, we called it "soda." But I knew a girl who called it "pop."Some folks call it "soda pop" because they have a lot of spare time for extra syllables, I guess.Whatever word you use, I'm glad you enjoy it!
Ooh, ! Guess I should've expected you to go for a deep cut! Where do you find that kind of stuff? I want to try it sometime!
I get it. You're just a beverage connoisseur, huh? If it's tasty, drinks it.I love that! If you try everything, you'll always find something new to love, .
Do you have a food that makes you go, "Ohmigosh, this is the BEST"?
So what's been one of your favorites lately, ?
Then what's your fave food these days, ?
Yeah, I love salad, and I can totes imagine you chomping on a healthy, low-key chic salad!We have GOT to discuss fave salad toppings sometime, !
Ooh, nice! Nothing warms you up like a good stew! Have you got a favorite recipe? I'd love to try it!
Right?! Cream puffs are sooo adorbs. They're fluffy and, it's a little weird, but they're kind of fun to juggle Then you pop them in your mouth and SQUISH! Tasty! We should make a batch sometime, !
Ooh, ! Guess I should've expected you to go for a deep cut! Where do you find that kind of stuff? I want to try it sometime!
No favorites? You must be a foodie! You're all about new experiences, new nomsno time for repeats!You've got to tell me about one of your tastiest adventures sometime, !
Do you have something you want to become? Like a dream job, maybe?
No worries! A lot of folks change their mind over time. So what do you want to be now, ?
So what do you want to be nowadays, ?

Ohmigosh, WHAAAAAT?! You want to be a pop-music star?!<10_10 />Me! Too! OHMIGOSH! <10_9 />We have GOT to sing a duet!We'll have fab guitar riffs, drum battles, piano explosions, saxophone flamethrowers—and us! Singing!We'll be the most popular pop-music stars the world has ever seen!

You want to be a fashion designer?! Ohmigosh, ! This is perfect!Listen. I have a highly successful pop-star career coming up, and I need a full wardrobe of stage outfits.First offsequins. How many can I wear and still be able to dance? Let's find out, !
Ohmigosh! You want to become a pastry chef?! Legit thoughttaste tester. You need one. Hire me.I have the skills, . I'm totally your .
Ooh, ! That's an awesome choice, and you'll be great at it!

Oh yeah? I get that. Some folks need the open roador the blue skythe endless seasWhatever metaphor works for you, grab hold of it and make it yours!I'm sure you'll find your lifething. When you do, , I'll so be cheering you on!
Tell me what hobbies get your heart racing, ! What're you into these days, ?
Ohmigosh, don't sweat it! I start new hobbies all the time! What hobbies are you into right now?
Ohmigosh, what are your hobbies nowadays, ?
Whaaat? Singing? I love singing too! Let's have an island karaoke party. Everyone can sing all night long!And since we're scheduling the party, we have more time to practice, !
Dancing! What kind? Ballroom? Tap? Ballet? In the bathroom, door closed, singing into a hair brush? Dancing is like using your whole body to talk. And when I'm dancing, I always say the same thing"!"

Ohmigosh! I've been streaming a metric load of anime lately!I've been re-watching stuff I loved as a kid, and even some that came out before I was born! We need to binge-watch a series sometime, . You can show me one of your favorites!
Ooh, ?! That sounds awesome. You've got to hit me with the deets on it sometime!
Well, if you ever find your hobby, let me know! I'll want to hear all about it, !
Ohmigosh, do you have any super fab skills, ?
Oh, for realsies?! Well, what's your glam skill nowadays, ?
So what kind of trendy skill are you rocking now, ?
Ohmigosh, what?! It's singing?! I'm pretty good at singing too! We NEED to have a karaoke party! Can you imagine us harmonizing? I bet it'd sound faaaantastic! We have GOT to make this happen!

Ohmigosh, dancing?! There's a bunch of kinds of dancing. Which one is your thing? I'm a dancing sensation, myself. I get going and I lose myself to it. I don't stop till someone tells me to!We need to have a dance party. We can blast our fave songs and dance all night, !

'K, fortune-telling?! Heh, Ionly put that on my list because I figured you'd say singing or dancingSo how's it work? You look at cards? Read palms? Or is it something classic like reading tea leaves?Or are you just playing a trick?<10_4 /> Oh wow, I can't believe I fell for that. You got me, .I know nobody can see the future, and fortune-telling is fake.<10_4 /> It is fake. Right?<10_4 /> Right, ?!
Ooh, ! You have to show me how you do that sometime, .
Really? You say that, but you're way skilled at stuff.You've done SO MUCH for this island, and sanely dealing with us batch of goofballs takes SKILL.
